name: DnD Dice Picker [WebGL]
description:
DnD Dice Picker* is a small project that allows people to have their own DnD Dice roller application! This version is built for WebGL and is intended to offer a solution to players that wish to run the application through their browser. 

System Requirements

Windows*

  • Google Chrome
  • Microsoft Edge (Chromium)

*Other browsers may be supported. I recommend a browser with Java decoding and HTML5 decoding support.

MacOS**

  • Safari
  • Google Chrome
  • Microsoft Edge (Chromium)

**Other browsers may be supported. I recommend a browser with Java decoding and HTML5 decoding support.

Android and iOS***

  • Default Phone Browser
  • Google Chrome

***Other browsers may be supported. I recommend a browser with Java decoding and HTML5 decoding support.

Internal Testing

DnD Dice Picker was developed and testing using systems with the following configurations:

MacOS

  • M1 Pro (10C CPU and 16C GPU)
  • 32GB RAM

Android (Virtualised through Android Studio for MacOS)

  • Emulated Pixel 3a running API Level 33 (Android 13)

*DnD Dice Picker is currently in development in the 'Alpha' stage. Current builds do not depict the final aesthetic of the game. Functional updates may be introduced at a later stage of development.
